      Prepare a whole array update which includes the default dimensions for indicating updating the whole array (a 1 length int array with -1 as its only element) -1 representing the dimension

      static NDArrayMessage.MessageValidity NDArrayMessage.validMessage(NDArrayMessage message)
      Returns if a message is valid or not based on a few simple conditions: no null values both index and the dimensions array must be -1 and of length 1 with an element of -1 in it otherwise it is a valid message.

      NDArrayMessage ChunkAccumulator.reassemble(String id)
